original_text: And there was no day like that before it or after it, that the Lord hearkened unto the voice of a man: for the Lord fought for Israel.
korean_text: 여호와께서 사람의 목소리를 들으신 이같은 날은 전에도 없었고 후에도 없었나니 이는 여호와께서 이스라엘을 위하여 싸우셨음이니라

sentences.original_text: And there was no day like that before it
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같은 날은 그 전에는 없었고

sentences.original_text: that the Lord hearkened unto the voice of a man
for the Lord fought for Israel
